plot: James reviews the new Aston Martin Virage and bashes on the Nurburgring. The boys head out to Italy for a Hot Hatchback Roadtrip with Jeremy in the Citroen DS3 Racing, Hammond in the Fiat 500C Abarth and James May in the Renaultsport Clio 200 Cup. They perform a number of tasks including a scavenger hunt of sorts as well as laps around the Monaco Grand Prix track through Monte Carlo. Ross Noble is the star in a reasonably priced car.—Anonymous
